hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Regime Breakout on 3-Day Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When the market transitions from NEUTRAL to BULL regime, a breakout above the 20-day Bollinger Band upper band, confirmed by volume exceeding its 10-day average by 50% for 3 consecutive days, will yield positive alpha over the following 10 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Regime transitions often see momentum acceleration as new capital enters. Volume confirmation reduces false breakouts. The 3-day filter ensures institutional participation rather than retail spikes.
entry_conditions: Regime transitions from NEUTRAL to BULL (confirmed by FjordHQ regime classifier)
BTC closes above 20-day Bollinger Band upper band
BTC volume > 1.5 * 10-day volume average for 3 consecutive days
BTC RSI(14) < 70 (to avoid overbought false breakouts)
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median 10-day return after entry conditions is ≤ 0% OR win rate < 55% across 50+ historical regime transitions.
